data.Name: Dave
data.Bio: There are at least two artists called Dave: 1) a British rapper, singer, songwriter, record producer, and actor, who is among the most recognised British hip-hop artists, and 2) a Dutch Francophone singer with a string of number one hits in France in the 1970s 1) David Orobosa Omoregie (born 5 June 1998), known professionally as Dave or Santan Dave, is a British rapper, singer, songwriter, record producer, and actor. Dave has gained acclaim for his socially conscious lyricism and wordplay and is among the most recognised British rappers. Read more on Last.fm
